## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G07970](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G07970)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>QRT2</u>
- **Gene Name:** QUARTET 2
- **Description:**   Pectin lyase-like superfamily protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2077407
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [AT3]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Reduced seed set. Indehiscent anthers.
   - [CS8051]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;outer walls of the four meiotic products of a pollen mother cell are fused and the pollen grains fail to separate, forming pollen tetrads; pollen viable and fertile, and fertilization with a single tetrad usually yields four seeds.
